body.p: 1. Grandfather of Tola, a minor judge who judged Israel from his native city, Shamir (Jgs 10:1).
2. Father of Eleazar, one of David’s mighty men known as “the Thirty” (2 Sm 23:9; 1 Chr 11:12). Dodo is perhaps identifiable with Dodai the Ahohite in 1 Chronicles 27:4. See Dodai.
3. Father of Elhanan, one of David’s mighty men known as “the Thirty” (2 Sm 23:24; 1 Chr 11:26). Dodo lived at Bethlehem.
